subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The fourth-seeded Cardinals (29-9) defeated Michigan State for their seventh win in a row, keeping Coach Rick Pitino undefeated in 10 regional semifinals.
snippet: The fourth-seeded Cardinals (29-9) defeated Michigan State for their seventh win in a row, keeping Coach Rick Pitino undefeated in 10 regional semifinals.
